rationale: Pending SAE reviews require immediate regulatory attention
Uncoded adverse event terms prevent proper safety signal detection
Missing visits mean missed safety assessments and protocol deviations
Missing CRF pages indicate incomplete subject records
Lab data issues can mask abnormal safety values
Delayed data entry reduces real-time safety monitoring capability
Long-outstanding missing pages indicate systemic site issues
Uncoded drug terms affect concomitant medication tracking
Open external data reconciliation issues need resolution
Multiple concurrent issue types indicate systemic problems
Inactivated forms are corrections, lowest risk priority
